TopicTitle: after edit cfg can't drag into VAB build pane

Articles.Content:
I made a cfg edit, but now I can't drag it into the area for building the rocket. If 'draop' off the mouse when I try to pull it from the equipment pane.

Any ideas what I messed up?

It happened to me when I used a comma 

    ,

 where I should be using a period/full stop

     .

It did it to me when I forgot to replace 'x, y, z' with actual numbers when I pasted a bit of code in. If you post your edit, we can probably spot your mistake ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Thanks for the tips, I redid it and it worked, probably was a comma in place of a decimal.
